title: Calories in One Tomato
meta_description: Discover calories in one tomato, including carbs, fiber, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per medium-sized raw tomato.
assumptions: Medium-sized raw tomato (~123 g), red, ripe; no added seasonings or dressings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by tomato variety, size, ripeness, and growing conditions. Check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One medium tomato provides about 22 kcal, mostly from carbs with good fiber content.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one tomato?
faqs.a: About 22 kcal for one medium raw tomato.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in one tomato?
faqs.a: Approximately 4.8 g carbs, including 1.5 g fiber and 3.2 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is one tomato low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.2 g total fat, with 0 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: How much protein in one tomato?
faqs.a: Roughly 1.1 g protein per medium tomato.
